scripts.reset: npx knex migrate:rollback --all && npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run
scripts.spinup2: docker exec -it launch_app psql -U postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE launch_app;"
scripts.spinup3: npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run
scripts.spinup: npm run spinup1 && sleep 5 && npm run spinup2 && sleep 5 && npm run spinup3
scripts.dockerreset: docker exec -it launch_app psql -U postgres -c "DROP DATABASE launch_app;"
